title: Жизнь после шоу. Беременна в 16
overview: A new talk show on the Yu TV channel in which former participants of the reality show "Pregnant at 16" will talk about how their life turned out after the project. The leading actors of the project, actor and TV presenter Oscar Kucera, as well as psychologist Victoria Dmitrieva will help to understand the most acute topics, unexpected twists of fate and life vicissitudes. Young mothers will be given advice and told about their experience by star guests and invited experts. All the most interesting things that happen to the participants of the reality show "Pregnant at 16" can be seen in the project "Life after the show.B16"
